mapper.sql: cp.ID, cp.PROJECT_ID, cp.JOIN_TIME, cp.SUPPLIER_ID, cp.BID_STATUS, cp.TOTAL_PRICE, cp.TOTAL_SCORE, cp.PACKAGE_ID, cp.IS_WON_BID, cp.IS_SEND_NOTICE, cp.CREATED_AT, cp.UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS (ID, PROJECT_ID, JOIN_TIME, SUPPLIER_ID, BID_STATUS, TOTAL_PRICE, TOTAL_SCORE, PACKAGE_ID, IS_WON_BID, IS_SEND_NOTICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE} )

insert into T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
JOIN_TIME,
SUPPLIER_ID,
BID_STATUS,
TOTAL_PRICE,
TOTAL_SCORE,
PACKAGE_ID,
IS_WON_BID,
IS_SEND_NOTICE,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,

#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{joinTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bidStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS
JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=DATE},
BID_STATUS = #{bidStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_WON_BID = #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_SEND_NOTICE = #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
where 1=1
and SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOIN_TIME = #{joinTime,jdbcType=DATE}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_STATUS = #{bidStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_WON_BID = #{isWonBid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_SEND_NOTICE = #{isSendNotice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT PP."ID",PP."NAME" FROM T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp WHERE PP.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId}

SELECT PP."NAME",pp."ID" as PPID,
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp INNER JOIN T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp ON PP."ID" = CP.PACKAGE_ID WHERE PP.PROJECT_ID =#{projectId} ORDER BY CP.TOTAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT CP.*,pp."NAME",PP."ID" as PPID FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp INNER JOIN T_BSS_PPMS_PACKAGE pp ON CP.PACKAGE_ID = PP."ID" WHERE 1=1 AND cp.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ORDER BY CP.TOTAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_PPMS_SUPPLIER_CHECK_PASS cp WHERE cp.PACKAGE_ID =#{packageId} and cp.IS_WON_BID =1
